newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Trading in Lap Heng shares resumes.
newsitem.headline: Trading in Lap Heng shares resumes.

text.p: Trading in Lap Heng Co Ltd shares resumes on Thursday following the general offer made by Guoco Group Ltd of HK$10.189 per share became unconditional, the companies said in a joint statement.
Valid acceptances of 5.94 million shares had been received under the offer, the companies said.

Taking into account the 27.49 million shares acquired from Lap Heng's controlling shareholders and the 45 million new shares issued by the company, the Guoco group owns about 78.44 million shares or 77.43 percent of the issued share capital of Lap Heng, they said.
Lap Heng shares jumped HK$3.20 to HK$11 shortly after the market opened on Thursday, but only 50,000 shares were traded in the first 10 minutes.
